Name: al B√†caro

Name: al B√†caro

Name: al B√†caro

Name: al B√†caro
Review Text: Fantastic authentic Italian in the heart of Amsterdam. Dont mind the tourists, the food will take you on a journey along the Italian cuisine. Lovely food, and proper service in Italian.

Name: al B√†caro

Name: al B√†caro

Name: al B√†caro

Review Text: First time in Amsterdam, picked al Bacaro based on other reviews. We were very pleased, great food, and staff. I would suggest you try the chefs appetizer selection it was great. Name: al B√†caro

Name: al B√†caro
Review Text: Fantastic! Mozzarella and meat were of great quality. And the bread was amazing and crunchy. Also service was very friendly :)

Name: al B√†caro
Review Text: Having had the pleasure of sampling some of NY and NJ when it comes to some of the finist Italian, this stands among the best. Name: al B√†caro
